text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews If COVID-19 is no big threat, and requests to end social distancing and lockdowns are so important and reasonable- I think Don Trump should go into the streets with his people, hold their hands and show his support!

These people won’t acknowledge that he refuses to go outside!
